SOLR_CACHE_DOCUMENT_EVICTIONS.description: Total amount of evictions in the document cache.

SOLR_CACHE_DOCUMENT_HITRATIO.description: The percentage of hits in the document cache.
SOLR_CACHE_DOCUMENT_HITRATIO.displayName: Percent of hits in document cache

SOLR_CACHE_DOCUMENT_HITS.description: Total amount of document cache hits (Number of requests where the doc. cache was used).

SOLR_CACHE_DOCUMENT_INSERTS.description: Total amount of inserts in the document cache.

SOLR_CACHE_DOCUMENT_LOOKUPS.description: Total amount of lookups in the document cache.

SOLR_CACHE_DOCUMENT_SIZE.description: The size of the document cache.

SOLR_CACHE_DOCUMENT_WARMUPTIME.description: The time needed (seconds) to warm up the document cache.
SOLR_CACHE_DOCUMENT_WARMUPTIME.displayName: Warmup time of the document cache

SOLR_JVM_MEMORY_FREE.description: Amount of free memory in the JVM stack used by SOLR.

SOLR_JVM_MEMORY_MAX.description: Total amount of JVM memory used by SOLR since the last startup.

SOLR_JVM_MEMORY_TOTAL.description: The total amount of allocated JVM memory size.

SOLR_JVM_MEMORY_USED.description: Total amount of JVM memory currently in use.

SOLR_JVM_PROCESSORS.description: Number of processors used by SOLR.

SOLR_JVM_UPTIME.description: Uptime of JVM used to serve the SOLR service.

SOLR_SYSTEM_COMMITED_VIRTUAL_MEMORY_SIZE.description: Total commited memory on the system reported by SOLR service.
SOLR_SYSTEM_COMMITED_VIRTUAL_MEMORY_SIZE.displayName: System commited memory size reported by SOLR

SOLR_SYSTEM_FREE_PHYSICAL_MEMORY_SIZE.description: Amount of free memory on the system reported by SOLR service.
SOLR_SYSTEM_FREE_PHYSICAL_MEMORY_SIZE.displayName: System free memory reported by SOLR

SOLR_SYSTEM_MAX_FILE_DESCRIPTOR_COUNT.description: Total amount of allowed file descriptors in the system.

SOLR_SYSTEM_OPEN_FILE_DESCRIPTOR_COUNT.description: Total amount of file descriptors open in the system.

SOLR_SYSTEM_PROCESS_CPU_TIME.description: CPU time on the system used by SOLR
SOLR_SYSTEM_PROCESS_CPU_TIME.displayName: System CPU time for for SOLR

SOLR_THREAD_CURRENT.description: Number of threads running to serv requests arriving to SOLR.

SOLR_THREAD_DAEMON.description: The number of running threads used by the SOLR daemon.

SOLR_THREAD_PEAK.description: The maximum number of threads in running state since the last startup.
